message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
I understand that $150 is a bit steep, but I'm not willing to go as low as $90. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer it to you for $120
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $110. I'll meet you halfway again, so I'll offer it to you for $115
I'm still really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go up to $115. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $112?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, and I think we're getting close to a deal. I'll meet you at $112.50
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm not willing to go up to $112.50. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $111?
